Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
An upwelling of civic pride, and displeasure with the occupying [[DM.Factions[faction_Kurita],Draconis Combine]] troops has turned into an independence movement on the world of [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Norn(Verthandi)],Verthandi]].  Sadly this has resulted in outbreaks of violence across the world and the Combine is expected to come down heavy on these seditionists.



The situation on [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Galtor],Galtor III]] has taken an unexpected turn, it appears that [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHanseDavion],The Fox]] finally turned his attention to the campaign and dispatched the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAFFSCrucisLancers],4th Crucis Lancers]] to reinforce the beleaguered [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDavionAFFS],AFFS]] units.  The Lancers were able to turn the tide and the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKuritaDCMS],DCMS]] has been driven from the system.



A radical new Combine variant, the [[DM.MechDefs[mechdef_trebuchet_TBT-7K],Trebuchet TBT-7K]] aims to use direct-fire support instead of the more typical indirect-fire model.  Only time will tell if this is truly a viable alternative to the tried and true standard [[DM.MechDefs[mechdef_trebuchet_TBT-5N],Trebuchet]].

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Smelling blood in the space lanes, pirate activity has surged this past month with attacks reported along the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePeriphery],Periphery]] borders.  [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLadyDeath],Lady Death]] has also reared her head, with bloody raids on the fringes of both [[DM.Factions[faction_Davion],Federated Suns]] and [[DM.Factions[faction_TaurianConcordat],Taurian]] space, few are left alive where her band of marauders strikes.



In the latest [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGrandTournament],Grand Tournament]] news, the field of 128 opponents has already been winnowed down, but there are still dozens of serious contenders left.  By the time you are hearing this, a winner has likely already been decided.





This has been the CNB October broadcast.
